summary: Add an ancient Egyptian type armours.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][font=Times New Roman][size=5][b]Horus by Neo
[/b][/size][/font][/color]
[color=yellow][b][size=3]Author : Meister aka Neovinci
[/size][/b][/color]
=================================


Add a new ancient Egyptian style Armours in your game.

Ordinarilly I don't take any request from users. it's difficult thing.

but one day I received a PM which from an Egyptian user, sort of an outlander
of this community. and asked an Egyptian style outfits, can't easily found out.
I didn't answer but I couldn't refuse that.

Why? because I also sort of an outlander in this community.

So I decided and made this mod.


[youtube]zIO5qaEOqq4[/youtube][youtube]TksxP6FkZcQ[/youtube]

from Chayification(youtube : Chayification) / from Hodilton (Youtube : Hodilton)


[youtube]Hs7LZgvWecE[/youtube][youtube]d-qmeu2xQrM[/youtube]

from vatiwah(youtube : vatiwah) / from izon87604(youtube : Nozi87)




[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]- Please check new updated files. (V1.10)
[/size][/color][/b] 


[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]- Normal and TBBP versions. (CBBE / UNP / DG)[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#ff7700][size=3]

- Helmets made only for human and elf races, not support Argonian and Khajiit races.[/size][/color][/b]

- not lore-friendly.

- unbalanced.

- for Male and Female

- Ebony and(or) Glass perk required for smithing.

- Heavy, Light type Armours and Clothes for Male and Female characters.

- The Container bag located near by front Entrance of Bleak Falls Barrow.

- You can craft and temper these armours with included clothes as ingredients.

- CBBE, UNP and Dream Girl types support for female characters.

- CBBE and UNP stuffs have custom shaped body, I made, therefore it has possibility clipping issue happen when you mixed to other armour/clothings.

- Please Don't ask other body types.

There is possibility contorted unnaturally with some active poses.






Use 7z tool, Unzip and Drag into DATA folder where your Skyrim is installed.

(..STEAM/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data)

Have an exciting journey in Skyrim.





=================================

[b][color=#ffff00]Location :[/color] [/b]In a Pouch, Front of Bleak Falls Barrow Entrance.(as screenshot)

[b][color=#ffff00]Requirement :[/color] [/b]CBBE TBBP / UNP TBBP (or UNPB TBBP) / Dream Girl TBBP for each own types you've installed.

[b][color=#ffff00]Recommend :[/color] [/b]XPMSE and HDT Physics System
              
=================================

=================================


You can do whatever with it for personal usage. 
It's not free for other's Conversion, neither Upload on any other sites.
Do not upload anywhere include Steam workshop without my Permission.
author: Meister aka neovinci
